Definition at line 82 of file AbstractOctree.h.

00083     {
00084       _parent->m_limit = _limit;
00085       _parent->m_height = _height;
00086       _parent->m_objectList.clear();
00087       _height--;
00088       if(_height == 0) // current level is leaves, no children
00089       {
00090         for(int i=0;i<8;++i)
00091         {
00092          _parent->m_child[i]= 0;
00093         }
00094       }
00095       else
00096       {
00097         BoundingBox childLimit;
00098         for(int i=0;i<8;++i)
00099         {
00100           _parent->m_child[i] = new TreeNode <T>;
00101           if(i%2==0) // i = 0, 2, 4, 6
00102           {
00103             childLimit.m_minx = _limit.m_minx;
00104             childLimit.m_maxx = (_limit.m_maxx+_limit.m_minx)/2.0;
00105           }
00106           else // i = 1, 3, 5, 7
00107           {
00108             childLimit.m_minx = (_limit.m_maxx+_limit.m_minx)/2.0;
00109             childLimit.m_maxx = _limit.m_maxx;
00110           }
00111           if(i==0 || i==1 || i==4 || i==5)
00112           {
00113             childLimit.m_miny = _limit.m_miny;
00114             childLimit.m_maxy = (_limit.m_maxy + _limit.m_miny)/2.0;
00115           }
00116           else
00117           {
00118             childLimit.m_miny = (_limit.m_maxy + _limit.m_miny)/2.0;
00119             childLimit.m_maxy = _limit.m_maxy;
00120           }
00121           if(i<4)
00122           {
00123             childLimit.m_minz = _limit.m_minz;
00124             childLimit.m_maxz = (_limit.m_maxz+_limit.m_minz)/2.0;
00125           }
00126           else
00127           {
00128             childLimit.m_minz = (_limit.m_maxz + _limit.m_minz)/2.0;
00129             childLimit.m_maxz = _limit.m_maxz;
00130           }
00131          createTree(_parent->m_child[i], _height, childLimit);
00132         } // end for
00133       }// end else
